column5: NOTE: BALD EAGLE COTTAGE IS CURRENTLY UNAVAILABLE FOR RESERVATIONS BECAUSE IT WILL BE LISTED FOR SALE SHORTLY.  Let us know if you are interested.   A lovely, tranquil, waterfront location in the Texas Hill Country on Lake Buchanan. Bald Eagle Cottage is a wonderful spot to kick back and commune with nature. Great for fisherman and family groups alike. Pet friendly for a flat $20 fee (for up to a week).
column8: Bald Eagle Cottage on the waters of Lake Buchanan
